definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
Huangyan district of Taizhou city 台州市[Tai1 zhou1 shi4], Zhejiang
Yunyan district of Guiyang city 貴陽市|贵阳市[Gui4 yang2 shi4], Guizhou

sentences.english: A massive sculpture of the seated Buddha rests in the yellowish sandstone cliffs at Single Pebble Village(Danzishizhen) just east of Chongqing.
sentences.chinese: 大佛坐落於重慶東部彈子石鎮附近一處黃砂岩懸崖上。

sentences.english: At Lava Hot Springs in Idaho, visitors may bathe in the thermal mineral waters.
sentences.chinese: 當熱熔岩在愛德荷州爆發，參觀者可以去那裏泡溫泉。

sentences.english: The formation of scheelite deposit has an intimate relationship with amphibole-schist.
sentences.chinese: 白鎢礦礦牀的形成與角閃片岩關係密切。

sentences.english: The greenschists originated from a series of volcanic - sedimentary formations with intercalated intracontinental tholeiites.
sentences.chinese: 綠片岩原巖是一套含板內拉斑玄武岩的火山沉積建造。

sentences.english: The quartz sandstone appears in the upper member of Yangzhuang Formation as thin-bedded strata with double peaks of grain size distribution.
sentences.chinese: 石英砂岩呈薄層出現在楊莊組上部，具雙衆數結構。

sentences.english: Hydrothermal sedimentary silicalite studies are important for ore deposits.
sentences.chinese: 熱水沉積硅質岩對於礦牀研究具有重要意義。

sentences.english: The small ocean basin is formed and the ophiolite appear when back arc basin expands.
sentences.chinese: 弧後盆地擴張到達小洋盆，出現蛇綠混雜岩。

sentences.english: I am an expert at ice climbing.
Nephrite deposits in Qinghai Province have occurred in contact belt between intermediate-acidic intrusive rocks and dolomite-marble.
sentences.chinese: 青海軟玉礦牀產於中酸性侵入岩與大理岩接觸帶中。

sentences.english: With more than 600 islands and coral cays, the reef covers more than 300, 000 sq.
sentences.chinese: 大堡礁有超過600個島嶼與珊瑚礁岩。

sentences.english: The effect of temperature on corrosion of different carbonatites varies.
sentences.chinese: 溫度對不同的碳酸鹽岩溶蝕的影響各異。

sentences.english: The host of gold deposit in Heishanliang is a silica rocks.
sentences.chinese: 甘肅黑山樑金礦以硅質岩爲主要含礦岩石的金礦牀。

sentences.english: A variety of geological environments are extrusive or intrusive rocks.
sentences.chinese: 不同的地質環境形成噴出巖或侵入岩。

sentences.english: The main rock types are two-mica quartz schist and plagioclase amphibole schist.
sentences.chinese: 主要岩石類型爲二雲石英片岩和斜長角閃片岩。

sentences.english: Yanshanian strongly peraluminous intrusive rocks occur sporadically in the Hebei-Shanxi-Liaoning area.
sentences.chinese: 燕山期強過鋁質侵入岩零星出露於冀晉遼地區。

sentences.english: The massive sulfide contains fragments of barren and mineralized gabbro, and schist.
sentences.chinese: 中含有礦化的和未礦化的輝長岩及片岩碎塊。
